feature.label: ExampleApp
feature.description: This is an example App implementing some API parts. This App makes use of many different options of the Blast2GO API It can be used as a template to create new Apps. The Example App creates a new menu item in Blast2GO, its wizard asked for some dummy parameters, its associated Job executes a command line. THe Job has a progress bar and prints some application messages. Finally a HTML result viewer and a generic table view are shown.
